Mayor & City Council Members

Mayor & Council Members Mayor Ruben Hurt mayor@cityofcoloradocity.org District 1 Sammy Contreras Jr. district1@cityofcoloradocity.org District 2 James Farquhar district2@cityofcoloradocity.org District 3 Amie Goldston dristrict3@cityofcoloradocity.org District 4 Cade Carlock district4@cityofcoloradocity.org District 5 Sarah Ann Cox-Kuss district5@cityofcoloradocity.org District 6 Bonnie Lane district6@cityofcoloradocity.org DISTRICT MAP

Description
Colorado City is governed by a Mayor and City Council who are elected by the people of the City. The Mayor and City Council acting together are the Governing Body. All Governing Body members serve two-year terms. The Governing Body, being the elected representative of the people, adopts all ordinances and resolutions and determines the general goals and policies.

Election
Council Members elected in even number years are District 3, District 4 and District 6.  Council Members elected in odd number years include the Mayor, District 1, District 2 and District 5.
Information on important dates for running for office can be found the Secretary of State web site .

Agendas are available prior to the meetings. Minutes are also available following approval.
